titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C22

body.ab:
<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0051__main__1"/>Cursed,
Cursed Creator! Why <lb n="c57-0051__main__2"/>did I
<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8686__Start"/>lif<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8686__End"/> live why
in that
instant
<lb n="c57-0051__main__3"/>did I not extinguish the spark of <lb n="c57-0051__main__4"/>existence which you had so wantonly <lb n="c57-0051__main__5"/>bestowed? I know
not—
Despair had not <lb n="c57-0051__main__6"/>yet taken possession of
me <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8698__Start"/>it w<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8698__End"/>I <lb n="c57-0051__main__7"/>was enraged
my feelings were those <lb n="c57-0051__main__8"/>of rage &
revenge –I <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8710__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8710__End"/>
could with
plea<lb n="c57-0051__main__9"/>sure<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8719__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8719__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8723__Start"/>torn<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8723__End"/>
have destroyed the cottage <lb n="c57-0051__main__10"/>and its inhabitants, and
glutted my<lb n="c57-0051__main__11"/>self with their shrieks &
misery. <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8738__Start"/>They<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8738__End"/><lb n="c57-0051__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8742__Start"/>As<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8742__End"/> When
night
came on
I quitted <lb n="c57-0051__main__13"/>my
retreat
and wandered
to
the
<lb n="c57-0051__main__14"/>wood.—
<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8749__Start"/>And
now<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8749__End"/>No
longer restrained <lb n="c57-0051__main__15"/>by the fear of
discovery
I gave vent <lb n="c57-0051__main__16"/>to my anguish in fearful howlings. <lb n="c57-0051__main__17"/>I was like a wild beast
in
the toils;
<lb n="c57-0051__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8768__Start"/>tearing<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8768__End"/><lb n="c57-0051__left_margin__1"/>destroying
the objects that obstructed
<lb n="c57-0051__main__19"/>me <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8784__Start"/>with<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8784__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8787__Start"/>fear<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8787__End"/>and
ranging through the <lb n="c57-0051__main__20"/>wood with
stag like swiftness.—
<lb n="c57-0051__main__21"/>Oh!
What a miserable night I
passed.
<lb n="c57-0051__main__22"/>the cold stars shone in mockery,
<lb n="c57-0051__main__23"/>the bare trees waved their branches <lb n="c57-0051__main__24"/>above
me and
now and then the sweet <lb n="c57-0051__main__25"/>voice of a bird burst forth amidst <lb n="c57-0051__main__26"/>the universal
stillness.– All <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>save I
were <lb n="c57-0051__main__27"/>at rest or in
enjoyment <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8825__Start"/>but I.<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8825__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8828__Start"/>A<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8828__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8830__Start"/>nd<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8830__End"/><lb n="c57-0051__main__28"/>I
like the
arch
fiend
bore
<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8838__Start"/>bo<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8838__End"/>
a hell <lb n="c57-0051__main__29"/>within
me
and, finding
<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8844__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8844__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8846__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8846__End"/>my<lb n="c57-0051__main__30"/>self
unsympathized
with,
I <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8856__Start"/>wi<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8856__End"/>
wished <lb n="c57-0051__main__31"/>to tear
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>up
the trees,
<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8871__Start"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e8871__End"/>
spread
havock<lb n="c57-0052__main__1"/>and
destruction
and then
have <lb n="c57-0052__main__2"/>sat down & enjoyed the
ruin–<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__3"/>But
this was a luxury of <lb n="c57-0052__main__4"/>sensation that could not
<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8890__Start"/>last<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8890__End"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__5"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/>endure
I
<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8904__Start"/>grew<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8904__End"/><del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8907__Start"/>tired<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8907__End"/>became
fatigued with excess of bodily
<lb n="c57-0052__main__6"/>exertion;
and sank on the
<lb n="c57-0052__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8918__Start"/>g<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8918__End"/>
damp grass in the
despondency
<lb n="c57-0052__main__8"/>of despair. There was
no one <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8923__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8923__End"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__9"/>amo<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8928__Start"/>u<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8928__End"/>ng
the myriads of men that <lb n="c57-0052__main__10"/>existed
that <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8934__Start"/>could<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8934__End"/>
would pity <lb n="c57-0052__main__11"/>or assist
me —
and should I feel <lb n="c57-0052__main__12"/>kindness towards my enemies?
<lb n="c57-0052__main__13"/>No!
from that moment I de<lb n="c57-0052__main__14"/>clared everlasting war against
<lb n="c57-0052__main__15"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/>the<metamark function="insert">^</metamark> species and
more than
all
against <lb n="c57-0052__main__16"/>him who had formed
me
& sent <lb n="c57-0052__main__17"/>me forth to
<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8980__Start"/>pain &<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e8980__End"/>this
insupportable
misery.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__18"/>The
sun
rose –
I heard the <lb n="c57-0052__main__19"/>voices of
men
and knew that it <lb n="c57-0052__main__20"/>was impossible to return to my retreat <lb n="c57-0052__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/>during that
day; accordingly,
I hid myself <lb n="c57-0052__main__22"/>in some thick
underwood <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9006__Start"/>determine<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9006__End"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__23"/>determining
to devote the
ensueing
<lb n="c57-0052__main__24"/>hours to reflection on my
situation— <lb n="c57-0052__main__25"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/>The
pleasant
sunshine
<lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__2"/>and
pure air of
day
<lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__3"/>restored me to some <lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__4"/>degree of
tranquillity &When
I considered what had passed <lb n="c57-0052__main__26"/>at the
cottage
I could not help <lb n="c57-0052__main__27"/>believing that I
was
too hasty in <lb n="c57-0052__main__28"/>my
conclusions – <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9042__Start"/>Ther<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9042__End"/>
I had certain<lb n="c57-0052__main__29"/>ly acted imprudently.
<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9051__Start"/>My con<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9051__End"/>
It was <lb n="c57-0052__main__30"/>apparent that my conversation <lb n="c57-0052__main__31"/>had
softened
the father
and I was a <lb n="c57-0052__main__32"/>fool
for
having exposed my person to the <lb n="c57-0052__main__33"/>horror of his children. I ought
to<lb n="c57-0053__main__1"/>have familia<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9087__Start"/>rzi<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9087__End"/>rized
the old De Lacey <lb n="c57-0053__main__2"/>to
me
and by degrees
have discovered <lb n="c57-0053__main__3"/>myself to the rest of
the family
when <lb n="c57-0053__main__4"/>they should have been prepared for <lb n="c57-0053__main__5"/>my
approach –
But I did not believe <lb n="c57-0053__main__6"/>my errors
irretrievable – and
after <lb n="c57-0053__main__7"/>much
consideration
I resolved to <lb n="c57-0053__main__8"/>return to the
cottage —
seek the <lb n="c57-0053__main__9"/>old
man
and by my representa<lb n="c57-0053__main__10"/>tions win him to my
party.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0053__main__11"/>These
thoughts calmed
me &<lb n="c57-0053__main__12"/>in
the afternoon I
sunk
into a <lb n="c57-0053__main__13"/>profound
sleep–
but the fever <lb n="c57-0053__main__14"/>of my blood did not
<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9135__Start"/>pe<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9135__End"/>
allow
of <lb n="c57-0053__main__15"/>peaceful dreams <del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9140__Start"/>for ever<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9140__End"/>
the hor<lb n="c57-0053__main__16"/>rible scene of the
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>preceeding
day
<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9166__Start"/>before<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9166__End"/><del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9169__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9169__End"/>was
for
ever<lb n="c57-0053__main__17"/>acting
before my
eyes –
The females <lb n="c57-0053__main__18"/>were
flying
and the
eraged
Felix <lb n="c57-0053__main__19"/>tearing me from his
fathers feet–
I <lb n="c57-0053__main__20"/>awoke
exhausted, and
finding that <lb n="c57-0053__main__21"/>it was already
night
I crept
from <lb n="c57-0053__main__22"/>my
hiding place
& went in search <lb n="c57-0053__main__23"/>of
food.<lb n="c57-0054__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0054.01" unit="tei:head"/>Chapt. 8<lb n="c57-0054__main__2"/>When
my hunger was
appeased
I directed <lb n="c57-0054__main__3"/>my steps towards the
well known
path <lb n="c57-0054__main__4"/>that conducted to the
cottage –
All
there,
<lb n="c57-0054__main__5"/>was at
peace – <del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9210__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9210__End"/>
I crept into my
hovel
<lb n="c57-0054__main__6"/>and remained in silent expectation of <lb n="c57-0054__main__7"/>the accustomed hour when the family <lb n="c57-0054__main__8"/>arose. That hour<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9223__Start"/><del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9223__End"/> past,
and
the sun mounted <lb n="c57-0054__main__9"/>high in the
heavens
but the cottagers <lb n="c57-0054__main__10"/>did not
appear –
I trembled violently, <lb n="c57-0054__main__11"/>apprehending some dreadful misfortune. <lb n="c57-0054__main__12"/>The inside of the cottage was
dark&
I <lb n="c57-0054__main__13"/>heard no
motion.
I cannot describe the <lb n="c57-0054__main__14"/>agony
I felt during
this
suspense.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0054__main__15"/>Presently
two countrymen
past by <lb n="c57-0054__main__16"/>but
pausing near the
cottage
they
enterred
<lb n="c57-0054__main__17"/>into
conversation
using violent
gestures
<lb n="c57-0054__main__18"/>I did not understand what they
said for
<lb n="c57-0054__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9257__Start"/>they<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9257__End"/>
their
language
differred
from that <lb n="c57-0054__main__20"/>of my
<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9262__Start"/>frien<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9262__End"/> protectors –
Soon After, however, <lb n="c57-0054__main__21"/>Felix approached with another
man
<lb n="c57-0054__main__22"/>I was
surprised
as I knew that
<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9270__Start"/>H<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9270__End"/>
he <lb n="c57-0054__main__23"/>had not quitted the cottage that
morning
<lb n="c57-0054__main__24"/>and waited anxiously to
discover by
<lb n="c57-0054__main__25"/>his
discourse
the meaning of these <lb n="c57-0054__main__26"/>unusual
appearances. "Do
you
consider, <lb n="c57-0054__main__27"/>"said
his companion to
him — that
you
<lb n="c57-0054__main__28"/>"will
be obliged to pay three
months rent <lb n="c57-0054__main__29"/>"&
to lose the produce of your
garden. <lb n="c57-0054__main__30"/>"<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9290__Start"/>Cons<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9290__End"/>
I do not
with
to take any unfair
advantage<lb n="c57-0055__main__1"/>and
I beg therefore that you will <lb n="c57-0055__main__2"/>take some days to
<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9307__Start"/>consult<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9307__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>consider ofabout <lb n="c57-0055__main__3"/>this affair with
your
<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9325__Start"/>friends.<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9325__End"/> determination.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__4"/>It
is utterly
useless–
replied
Felix,
<lb n="c57-0055__main__5"/>we
can never
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>again
inhabit
that cottage <lb n="c57-0055__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9350__Start"/>again<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9350__End"/> –The
life of
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my
father is in the greatest
<lb n="c57-0055__main__7"/>danger
owing to the dreadful
circumstanc
<lb n="c57-0055__main__8"/>that I have
related—
My wife and
sister
<lb n="c57-0055__main__9"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9371__Start"/>can<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9371__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will
never recover their
horror— <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9382__Start"/>Do<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9382__End"/>
I <lb n="c57-0055__main__10"/>entreat you not to reason with me <lb n="c57-0055__main__11"/>any
more—<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9389__Start"/>let<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9389__End"/>
Take possession
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of
your
tenement
and let me <lb n="c57-0055__main__12"/>fly from this
place – <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9405__Start"/>very<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9405__End"/>We intend <lb n="c57-0055__main__13"/>very soon to quit entirely the country.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__14"/>Felix
trembled violently as he said <lb n="c57-0055__main__15"/>this. He and his companion entered the
<lb n="c57-0055__main__16"/>cottage <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9422__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9422__End"/>
in which they remained for a <lb n="c57-0055__main__17"/>few
minutes
& then departed. I never
<lb n="c57-0055__main__18"/>again
saw any of the family of de
Lacey.<lb n="c57-0055__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9436__Start"/>They had qu<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9436__End"/>more.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__20"/>And now my hopes were entirely <lb n="c57-0055__main__21"/>fled –were I had been fool enough to <lb n="c57-0055__main__22"/>hope but these><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__23"/>I <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9459__Start"/>remained<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9459__End"/>continued<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9465__Start"/>all night<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9465__End"/> in my hovel<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>
for the remainder of the
day<lb n="c57-0055__main__24"/>in
a state of utter & stupid
despair–
<lb n="c57-0055__main__25"/>my protectors had
departed
and had <lb n="c57-0055__main__26"/>broken the only link that held me <lb n="c57-0055__main__27"/>to the
world–
for the first time the
<lb n="c57-0055__main__28"/>feeling
of revenge and hatred filled <lb n="c57-0055__main__29"/>my bosom, and I did not strive to
<lb n="c57-0055__main__30"/>controul
them — but
allowing myself <lb n="c57-0055__main__31"/>to be borne away by the
stream
I <lb n="c57-0055__main__32"/>bent my
mind<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9499__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9499__End"/>
towards
<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9502__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9502__End"/>
injury &
death– <lb n="c57-0055__main__33"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9508__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9508__End"/>
when I thought of my
friends–
of <lb n="c57-0055__main__34"/>the mild voice of De
Lacey
the gentle <lb n="c57-0055__main__35"/>eyes of
Agatha –
and the
<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9515__Start"/>warm<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9515__End"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9518__Start"/>he<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9518__End"/><lb n="c57-0056__main__1"/>exquisite
beauty of the
Arabian —
these thoughts
<lb n="c57-0056__main__2"/>vanished&
a gush of tears somewhat soothed
<lb n="c57-0056__main__3"/>me—But again <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when
I reflected that they had <lb n="c57-0056__main__4"/>spurned & deserted me, anger
returned <lb n="c57-0056__main__5"/>and
unable to
<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9550__Start"/>hurt<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9550__End"/>
injure
anything <lb n="c57-0056__main__6"/>human
I turned my fury towards <lb n="c57-0056__main__7"/>inanimate
objects.–
As night
advanced
<lb n="c57-0056__main__8"/>I placed a variety of combustibles around <lb n="c57-0056__main__9"/>the
cottage, and
after having destroyed <lb n="c57-0056__main__10"/>every vestige of cultivation in the
<lb n="c57-0056__main__11"/>garden — <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9569__Start"/>when<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9569__End"/><del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9572__Start"/>the sun h<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9572__End"/>the <lb n="c57-0056__main__12"/>moon had
I waited with forced
pa<lb n="c57-0056__main__13"/>tience untill
the moon had sunk
<lb n="c57-0056__main__14"/><del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9590__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9590__End"/>
to commence my
operations. As
<lb n="c57-0056__main__15"/>the night
advanced
a fierce wind <lb n="c57-0056__main__16"/>arose from the
woods
and quickly
<lb n="c57-0056__main__17"/><del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9598__Start"/>covered the heavens wit<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9598__End"/>
dispersed <lb n="c57-0056__main__18"/>the clouds that had loitered in the
<lb n="c57-0056__main__19"/>heavens— <milestone spanTo="#c57-0056.03" unit="tei:seg"/>Like a mighty avelanche<lb n="c57-0056__main__20"/><lb n="c57-0056__left_margin__1"/>the
blast
<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9618__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9618__End"/>
tore
a
long <metamark corresp="#c57-0056.03" function="displacement">/</metamark>
and
<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9626__Start"/>filled with<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9626__End"/><lb n="c57-0056__main__21"/>produced <milestone spanTo="#c57-0056.04" unit="tei:seg"/>in my spirits
a kind <lb n="c57-0056__main__22"/>of insanity
<metamark corresp="#c57-0056.04" function="displacement">/</metamark>
that burst all bounds <lb n="c57-0056__main__23"/>of reason
or reflection —
I lighted
<lb n="c57-0056__main__24"/>a
dry branch of
tree
and danced <lb n="c57-0056__main__25"/>with
<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9649__Start"/>wild<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9649__End"/>
fury around the devoted <lb n="c57-0056__main__26"/>cottage, my eyes still fixed on the <lb n="c57-0056__main__27"/>western horizon,
<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9657__Start"/>towards<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9657__End"/>
the edge <lb n="c57-0056__main__28"/>of which the moon nearly
touched.<lb n="c57-0056__main__29"/>part
of
it
orb was
<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9667__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9667__End"/>
at length
<lb n="c57-0056__main__30"/>hid
and I waved my
brand —
it
sunk<lb n="c57-0057__main__1"/>and
with a loud
scream
I
fird
<lb n="c57-0057__main__2"/>the
straw
and
hay <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9682__Start"/>of my bon<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9682__End"/> that
<lb n="c57-0057__main__3"/>I had collected. The wind
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9689__Start"/>blew<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9689__End"/>fanned
the
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9699__Start"/>flame<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9699__End"/>fire<lb n="c57-0057__main__4"/>and
the cottage was quickly enveloped <lb n="c57-0057__main__5"/>by the
flames
which clung to
it
<lb n="c57-0057__main__6"/>and
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9718__Start"/>liked<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9718__End"/>
licked it with
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9722__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9722__End"/><del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9725__Start"/>with<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9725__End"/><lb n="c57-0057__main__7"/>their
forked
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9732__Start"/>ton<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9732__End"/>&
destroying
tongues, to destroy <lb n="c57-0057__main__8"/>it—. As
soon as I was convinced that <lb n="c57-0057__main__9"/>no
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9748__Start"/>hu<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9748__End"/>
assistance could save any <lb n="c57-0057__main__10"/>part of the
habitation
I quitted <lb n="c57-0057__main__11"/>the
scene
and sought for refuge <lb n="c57-0057__main__12"/>in the
wood.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0057__main__13"/>And now <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9762__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9762__End"/>
with the world before
<lb n="c57-0057__main__14"/>me w<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hither
should I bend my steps? <lb n="c57-0057__main__15"/>I resolved to fly far from the scene <lb n="c57-0057__main__16"/>of my
misfortunes – <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9785__Start"/>And<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9785__End"/>But
to me, hated <lb n="c57-0057__main__17"/>and despised, every country
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9794__Start"/>And<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9794__End"/><lb n="c57-0057__main__18"/>must
be equally
horrible.–
At length <lb n="c57-0057__main__19"/>the thought of you crossed my
<lb n="c57-0057__main__20"/>mind —
I learned from your papers <lb n="c57-0057__main__21"/>that you
<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9808__Start"/>was I<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9808__End"/>were
my
creator
& to whom
<lb n="c57-0057__main__22"/><del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9816__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9816__End"/>
could I apply with more fitness <lb n="c57-0057__main__23"/>than to him who had given
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me life.
<lb n="c57-0057__main__24"/>Among the lessons that Felix had <lb n="c57-0057__main__25"/>bestowed
on <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9844__Start"/>Maimouna<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9844__End"/>Safie
geography <lb n="c57-0057__main__26"/>had not been
ommitted. From <lb n="c57-0057__main__27"/>these
I had learned
the relative <lb n="c57-0057__main__28"/>situations of the different countries <lb n="c57-0057__main__29"/><lb n="c57-0057__left_margin__1"/>of the
earth;
You had mentioned Geneva as <lb n="c57-0057__main__30"/>the name of your native
town
<lb n="c57-0057__main__31"/>& to<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9873__Start"/>wards<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e9873__End"/> this place I resolved to
<lb n="c57-0057__main__32"/>proceed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0058__main__1"/>But
how was I to direct
myself?—<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>I
knew that I must travel <lb n="c57-0058__main__2"/><lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__1"/>in a
South westerlydirection<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9911__Start"/>I knew<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9911__End"/>to
reach my
destination
but
<lb n="c57-0058__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9915__Start"/>in this<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9915__End"/>
the sun was my only
guide –
I did not <lb n="c57-0058__main__4"/>know the names of the towns
I was to pass <lb n="c57-0058__main__5"/>through, nor could I ask information from <lb n="c57-0058__main__6"/>a single human
being –
But I did not
despair
<lb n="c57-0058__main__7"/>From you only could I hope for
succour
<lb n="c57-0058__main__8"/>although towards you I felt
<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9931__Start"/>only<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9931__End"/>no<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9937__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9937__End"/>senti<lb n="c57-0058__main__9"/>ment<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9947__Start"/>s of<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9947__End"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9952__Start"/>detestatio<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9952__End"/>that
that of
hate. – Unfeeling
heartless <lb n="c57-0058__main__10"/>creator! You had endowed me with percep<lb n="c57-0058__main__11"/>tions and
passions
and then cast me
<lb n="c57-0058__main__12"/>abroard
for the scorn & horror of
man<lb n="c57-0058__main__13"/>kind — <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9976__Start"/>On<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9976__End"/>
But on you only had I any <lb n="c57-0058__main__14"/>claim
& from you I determined to seek that <lb n="c57-0058__main__15"/>justice
<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9990__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9990__End"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9993__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9993__End"/>
which I
<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9996__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e9996__End"/>
vainly attempted <lb n="c57-0058__main__16"/>to gain from
<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10001__Start"/>your fellow creatures.<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10001__End"/><lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__1"/>any
other being <lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__2"/>that wore the human
<lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__3"/>form. .<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0058__main__17"/>My
travels were
long
and
<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10020__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10020__End"/>
the
<lb n="c57-0058__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10024__Start"/>suff<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10024__End"/>
sufferings I endured
intense –It
was <lb n="c57-0058__main__19"/>late in autumn when I quitted the <lb n="c57-0058__main__20"/>district where I had so long
resided – Months <lb n="c57-0058__main__21"/>passed and I knew not how near I
I tra<lb n="c57-0058__main__22"/>velled only at night, fearful of
meeting
<lb n="c57-0058__main__23"/>the visage of a human
being.—Nature
<lb n="c57-0058__main__24"/>decayed around
me
and the sun became
<lb n="c57-0058__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10054__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10054__End"/> heatless,—rain
& snow poured around
me
and I <lb n="c57-0058__main__26"/>found no
shelter — Oh Earth
how often <lb n="c57-0058__main__27"/>did I imprecate curses on the cause of <lb n="c57-0058__main__28"/>my
being—
The mildness of
<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10066__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10066__End"/>
my nature <lb n="c57-0058__main__29"/>had
fled
& all within me was turned to gall
<lb n="c57-0058__main__30"/>& bitterness – I hated De Lacey
and
his family <lb n="c57-0058__main__31"/>and
the nearer I approached to your
habi<lb n="c57-0058__main__32"/>tation
the more deeply did I feel the spirit <lb n="c57-0058__main__33"/>of revenge
<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10094__Start"/>imprint itself on<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10094__End"/>become kindled
in my
heart—<lb n="c57-0059__main__1"/>Snow fell around me
and the waters <lb n="c57-0059__main__2"/>were
hardened,
but I rested
not—A
few <lb n="c57-0059__main__3"/>incidents now and then directed
me <lb n="c57-0059__main__4"/>right
but I often
<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10115__Start"/>de<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10115__End"/>
wandered wide from <lb n="c57-0059__main__5"/>my path.
<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0059.01">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__2"/>The
agony of <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__3"/>my
grief
<lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__4"/>allowed me no
<lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__5"/>respite, <del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10140__Start"/>N<del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10140__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__6"/><del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10144__Start"/>No event of my<del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10144__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__7"/>No
incident <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__8"/>occurred from <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__9"/>which my rage <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__10"/>& misery could <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__11"/>not extract its
<lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__12"/>food.<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10164__Start"/>incident<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10164__End"/>but
a circumstance that happened <lb n="c57-0059__main__6"/>when I arrived on the confines of
Swit<lb n="c57-0059__main__7"/>zerland —
when the sun had recovered
<lb n="c57-0059__main__8"/>a part of
its
heat
& the earth again <lb n="c57-0059__main__9"/>began to look
green
confirmed in
an<lb n="c57-0059__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10188__Start"/>dreadful<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10188__End"/>especial
manner the bitterness
&<lb n="c57-0059__main__11"/>horror
of my
feelings.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0059__main__12"/>I
generally rested
<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10204__Start"/>through<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10204__End"/>during
the <lb n="c57-0059__main__13"/>day, and travelled only when I was se<lb n="c57-0059__main__14"/>cured by night from the view of man.
<lb n="c57-0059__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10221__Start"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10221__End"/>
one
morning however
finding <lb n="c57-0059__main__16"/>that my path lay through a deep
<lb n="c57-0059__main__17"/>wood
I ventured to continue my
<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10229__Start"/>way<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10229__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__main__18"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/>journey
after the sun had
risenhigh in <lb n="c57-0059__main__19"/>the heavens.
The
day
which was one <lb n="c57-0059__main__20"/>of the first of
spring <del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10250__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10250__End"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10253__Start"/>even<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10253__End"/>
cheered <lb n="c57-0059__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/>even me by the loveliness of its
sun<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>shine&<lb n="c57-0059__main__22"/>the gentleness
of the
breeze. –
I felt
<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10277__Start"/>feelings<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10277__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__main__23"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/>emotions
of
softness
and
pleasure
that had <lb n="c57-0059__main__24"/>long appeared dead, revive within
me;
<lb n="c57-0059__main__25"/>half
surprized with
these
new sensa<lb n="c57-0059__main__26"/>tions
I allowed myself to be borne <lb n="c57-0059__main__27"/>away by
them &<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10303__Start"/>forg<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10303__End"/>
forgetting my <lb n="c57-0059__main__28"/>solitude &
deformity
dared to be
happy
<lb n="c57-0059__main__29"/>tears
of gentleness
again bedewed my
<lb n="c57-0059__main__30"/>cheeks
and I
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>even
raised my humid eyes <lb n="c57-0059__main__31"/>with
thankfullness
towards the blessed <lb n="c57-0059__main__32"/>sun which bestowed
<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10327__Start"/>on me<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10327__End"/>
such joy upon
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0060__main__1"/>As I continued my way in this mood I <lb n="c57-0060__main__2"/>heard a voices which forced me to conceal my<lb n="c57-0060__main__3"/>self. This I did in a small cave surrounded by <lb n="c57-0060__main__4"/>wood at the foot of which was a <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>deep & impetuous river – I <lb n="c57-0060__main__5"/>presently discovered that the voices proceeded <lb n="c57-0060__main__6"/>from people who were on the rock which <lb n="c57-0060__main__7"/>formed the roof of the cavern – They spoke a <lb n="c57-0060__main__8"/>language unknown to me – when suddenly <lb n="c57-0060__main__9"/>I heard a noise and saw a <del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10380__Start"/>woma<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10380__End"/> young girl <lb n="c57-0060__main__10"/>fall from the precipiece into the river a <lb n="c57-0060__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10386__Start"/>and aloud<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10386__End"/> loud scream followed & all was quiet– <lb n="c57-0060__main__12"/>I rushed from my hiding place & dashing into <lb n="c57-0060__main__13"/>the river rescued the girl & bore her to the <lb n="c57-0060__main__14"/>shore. She was senseless & I endeavoured to <lb n="c57-0060__main__15"/>restore her to life when a man came sudden<lb n="c57-0060__main__16"/>ly from the woods and appeared aghas<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0060__main__17"/>I
continued to wind among the paths of the
<lb n="c57-0060__main__18"/>wood untill
I came to its
<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10412__Start"/>skirts<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10412__End"/> boundary
which <lb n="c57-0060__main__19"/>was skirted
a deep & rapid
river —
into which <lb n="c57-0060__main__20"/>many of the trees bent their
branches
now budding <lb n="c57-0060__main__21"/>with the fresh
spring.–
Here I paused, not exact<lb n="c57-0060__main__22"/>ly knowing what
course
to
pursue
when I heard
<lb n="c57-0060__main__23"/>voices
that induced me to conceal myself under <lb n="c57-0060__main__24"/>the shade of
cypress. A rustic approached armed <lb n="c57-0060__main__25"/>with a gun and leading
a
young girl of about twelve <lb n="c57-0060__main__26"/>years of age When they came near me they turne<lb n="c57-0060__main__27"/>I
was scarcely
hid
when a young girl came run<lb n="c57-0060__main__28"/>ning towards the
<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10452__Start"/>river<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10452__End"/>spot
where I was
concealed –
laughing
as if she
had
ran <lb n="c57-0060__main__29"/>from some one in
sport –
She continued her <lb n="c57-0060__main__30"/>course along the
precipitate
sides of the
river
<lb n="c57-0060__main__31"/>when suddenly her foot slipt, & she fell
into<lb n="c57-0060__main__32"/>the
rapid
<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10473__Start"/>current<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10473__End"/>stream.
I rushed from my
hiding
<lb n="c57-0060__main__33"/>place and
with extreme labour from the <lb n="c57-0060__main__34"/>force of the
current
saved her, & dragged her <lb n="c57-0060__main__35"/>to
shore —
She was
<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10487__Start"/>sensell<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10487__End"/> senseless
and
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>Iendeavo<lb n="c57-0060__main__36"/>ured
by every means in my
power
to
restore<lb n="c57-0061__main__1"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10515__Start"/>her<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10515__End"/><lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__1"/>animation
when I was suddenly interrupted by <lb n="c57-0061__main__2"/>the approach of a
rustic
who was probably
<lb n="c57-0061__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10529__Start"/>her<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10529__End"/>
the person from whom she had <lb n="c57-0061__main__4"/>playfully
fled –
On seeing
me
he darted <lb n="c57-0061__main__5"/>towards
me
and
<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10539__Start"/>tore<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10539__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>tearing
the girl from <lb n="c57-0061__main__6"/>my
arms
hastened towards the deeper <lb n="c57-0061__main__7"/>parts of the
forest — I know not by <lb n="c57-0061__main__8"/>what
I followed
speedily
I hardly knew
<lb n="c57-0061__main__9"/>why
but when the man saw me <lb n="c57-0061__main__10"/>draw
near
he aimed a
gun
which <lb n="c57-0061__main__11"/>he carried, at my
body
& fired. I <lb n="c57-0061__main__12"/>sunk to the
ground
&
with
encreased <lb n="c57-0061__main__13"/>swiftness He
escaped into the
wood.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0061__main__14"/>This then
was
the reward of my
<lb n="c57-0061__main__15"/>benevolence
I
writhed under the <lb n="c57-0061__main__16"/>wound.<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10585__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10585__End"/>
had saved a human <lb n="c57-0061__main__17"/>being from
destruction and
as a
<lb n="c57-0061__main__18"/>recompence
I now writhed
<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10592__Start"/>un<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10592__End"/>
under <lb n="c57-0061__main__19"/>the miserable pain of
<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10597__Start"/>my wound<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10597__End"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10600__Start"/>a multitude of<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10600__End"/><lb n="c57-0061__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10605__Start"/>wounds.<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10605__End"/><lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__1"/>a wound
which <lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__2"/>shattered the <lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__3"/>flesh &
bone <del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10620__Start"/>One The ball had grazed my neck<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10620__End"/>&the <lb n="c57-0061__main__21"/>an other entered my shoulder.
The feelings <lb n="c57-0061__main__22"/>of kindness and
<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10634__Start"/>softness<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10634__End"/>gentleness
which I had <lb n="c57-0061__main__23"/>entertained but a few moments
before
<lb n="c57-0061__main__24"/>gave place to hellish rage & gnashing <lb n="c57-0061__main__25"/>of
teeth –
inflamed by
pain
I vowed <lb n="c57-0061__main__26"/>eternal hatred & vengeance to all
<lb n="c57-0061__main__27"/>mankind —
But
<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10654__Start"/>pain<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10654__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the
agony of my wound overcame
me <lb n="c57-0061__main__28"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10666__Start"/>sens<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10666__End"/>
my pulses
paused
and I
fainted.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0061__main__29"/>For
some weeks I led a miserable <lb n="c57-0061__main__30"/>life in
these woods
endeavouring to <lb n="c57-0061__main__31"/>cure the wound which I had received. The <lb n="c57-0061__main__32"/>ball had entered my
shoulder
and I knew <lb n="c57-0061__main__33"/>not whether it had remained there <lb n="c57-0061__main__34"/>or passed
through—at
any rate I
had<lb n="c57-0062__main__1"/>no
means of extracting it.
<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10695__Start"/>A<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10695__End"/>
My
suffering
were <lb n="c57-0062__main__2"/>augmented also by the oppressive sense
<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10700__Start"/>I had<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10700__End"/><lb n="c57-0062__main__3"/>of
the injustice & ingratitude
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of
their
infliction
My daily
<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10721__Start"/>prayers<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10721__End"/>vows<lb n="c57-0062__main__4"/>rose
for
revenge – a
deep & deadly
revenge
<lb n="c57-0062__main__5"/>such as would alone compensate for the
<lb n="c57-0062__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10736__Start"/>horrors of my situation.<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10736__End"/>the
outrages &
the
anguish I had
endured.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0062__main__7"/>After
some weeks my wound
healed
<lb n="c57-0062__main__8"/>and I continued my
journey —
the labours <lb n="c57-0062__main__9"/>I endured were no longer
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to
be alleviated by the <lb n="c57-0062__main__10"/>bright sun or
gent<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10763__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10763__End"/>le
breezes of
spring —
<lb n="c57-0062__main__11"/>all joy was but a
mockery to me, <lb n="c57-0062__left_margin__1"/>
which insul<lb n="c57-0062__left_margin__2"/>ted my desolate <lb n="c57-0062__left_margin__3"/>state,
&<lb n="c57-0062__main__12"/>made
me feel more painfully that <lb n="c57-0062__main__13"/>I was not made for
enjoyment. But
<lb n="c57-0062__main__14"/>my
<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10800__Start"/>journey<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e10800__End"/>toils
now drew near a
close &
two <lb n="c57-0062__main__15"/>months from this
time
I reached the <lb n="c57-0062__main__16"/>environs of
Geneva.<milestone spanTo="#c57-0062.04" unit="tei:head"/><lb n="c57-0062__main__17"/>The same <lb n="c57-0062__main__18"/>chapter <lb n="c57-0062__main__19"/>continued<lb n="c57-0063__main__1"/><del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10829__Start"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0063.01" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 9th<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10829__End"/><lb n="c57-0063__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10838__Start"/>I now saw <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10838__End"/><del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10841__Start"/>Thus my journey appeared<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10841__End"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0063__main__3"/>It
was evening when I
arrived in the outskirts <lb n="c57-0063__main__4"/>of <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10852__Start"/>Geneva<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10852__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that town
and I retired to a
hiding place
among the <lb n="c57-0063__main__5"/>fields that
surround<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10865__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10865__End"/>
it, to
consider
in what <lb n="c57-0063__main__6"/>manner I should apply to you. I was oppressed <lb n="c57-0063__main__7"/>by fatigue and
hunger
and far too unhappy to <lb n="c57-0063__main__8"/>enjoy the
gentl<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10875__Start"/>l<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10875__End"/>e
breezes of
evening
or the prospect <lb n="c57-0063__main__9"/>of the sun setting behind the stupendous moun<lb n="c57-0063__main__10"/>tains of
the Jura. At
this time
<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10887__Start"/>I was relieved by<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10887__End"/><lb n="c57-0063__main__11"/>a
slight sleep
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>relieved
me
which was disturbed by the <lb n="c57-0063__main__12"/>approach of a beautiful
child
who came <lb n="c57-0063__main__13"/>running into the recess I had
chosen
with <lb n="c57-0063__main__14"/>all the sportiveness of
infancy—Suddenly
as I <lb n="c57-0063__main__15"/>gazed on
him an<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10922__Start"/>thought<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10922__End"/>idea
seized
me –
that <lb n="c57-0063__main__16"/>this little creature was
<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10931__Start"/>uncorrupted &<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10931__End"/>unpre<lb n="c57-0063__main__17"/>judiced&
had lived too short a time to have <lb n="c57-0063__main__18"/>imbibed
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a
horror of deformity.
If therefore
I <lb n="c57-0063__main__19"/>could seize
him
& educate him as my <lb n="c57-0063__main__20"/>companion & friend, I should not be so <lb n="c57-0063__main__21"/>desolate in this peopled
earth. <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10981__Start"/>Un<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10981__End"/> Urged
by this
<lb n="c57-0063__main__22"/>impulse
I seized on the boy as he
passed
<lb n="c57-0063__main__23"/>and drew him towards me. As soon as he beheld <lb n="c57-0063__main__24"/>my
form
he placed his
hand
before his
eyes
<lb n="c57-0063__main__25"/>& uttered a shrill
scream.
I drew his hand <lb n="c57-0063__main__26"/>forcibly from his
<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10997__Start"/>eyes<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e10997__End"/>face& said Child, w<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hat
is <lb n="c57-0063__main__27"/>the meaning of this? I do not intend to hurt
<lb n="c57-0063__main__28"/>you—
listen to
me. He
struggled
violently <lb n="c57-0063__main__29"/>Let
me
g<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11021__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11021__End"/>o<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11024__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11024__End"/>
he
cried— Monster —
ugly
wretch
<lb n="c57-0063__main__30"/>You wish to eat
me
& tear me to
pieces you
<lb n="c57-0063__main__31"/>are an
ogre, – let
me
go
or I will tell my
papa. <lb n="c57-0063__main__32"/>Boy said I –
You will never see your father
<lb n="c57-0063__main__33"/>again –you
must come with
me. He <lb n="c57-0063__main__34"/>burst into loud cries — hideous monster
<lb n="c57-0063__main__35"/>let me
go —
My papa is a
syndic he
is <lb n="c57-0063__main__36"/>M.
Frankenstien let me go
you dare not <lb n="c57-0063__main__37"/>keep
me. Frankenstein cried I —
You belong then <lb n="c57-0063__main__38"/>to my
enemy–To <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11053__Start"/>wh<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11053__End"/>
him towards whom I
have<lb n="c57-0064__main__1"/>sworn
eternal
revenge &
you shall be <lb n="c57-0064__main__2"/>my first
victim. The
child still
struggled
<lb n="c57-0064__main__3"/>& loaded me
with<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11067__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11067__End"/>
epithets which carried <lb n="c57-0064__main__4"/>despair to my
heart –
I grasped his throat <lb n="c57-0064__main__5"/>to silence
him
& in a moment he lay <lb n="c57-0064__main__6"/>dead at my
feet.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0064__main__7"/>I
gazed on my
victim
and my heart <lb n="c57-0064__main__8"/>swelled with exultation and hellish
<lb n="c57-0064__main__9"/>triumph — <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11092__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11092__End"/>
clapping my
hands <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11101__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11101__End"/>
I
exclaimed <lb n="c57-0064__main__10"/>I <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11108__Start"/>too<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11108__End"/>too
can
<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11118__Start"/>destroy<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11118__End"/>make desolate. –
My enemy is not
impreg<lb n="c57-0064__main__11"/>nable;
this death will carry despair to
<lb n="c57-0064__main__12"/>him
& a
thousand
thousand
others <metamark>^</metamark>miseries<lb n="c57-0064__main__13"/><del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11145__Start"/>will d<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11145__End"/>
shall torment & destroy
him. <lb n="c57-0064__main__14"/>As
I fixed my eyes on the
child
I saw <lb n="c57-0064__main__15"/><lb n="c57-0064__left_margin__1"/>something glittering on his
breast –
I took
it
<lb n="c57-0064__main__16"/>I
was
the
portrait of a most lovely woman. <lb n="c57-0064__main__17"/>In spite of my
malignity <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11172__Start"/>and horro<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11172__End"/>
it <lb n="c57-0064__main__18"/>softened and attracted me. for a few <lb n="c57-0064__main__19"/>moments I gazed with delight on her <lb n="c57-0064__main__20"/>dark
<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11184__Start"/>black<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11184__End"/>deep eyes
&
lovely
lips
but <lb n="c57-0064__main__21"/>presently my rage returned: I remembered <lb n="c57-0064__main__22"/>that I was for ever deprived of the <lb n="c57-0064__main__23"/>delights
such
<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11197__Start"/>ba<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11197__End"/>
beautiful creatures <lb n="c57-0064__main__24"/>could
bestow –
and that
<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11204__Start"/>the cont<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11204__End"/>
she whose <lb n="c57-0064__main__25"/>resemblance I contemplated
<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11210__Start"/>wh<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11210__End"/>
would,
<lb n="c57-0064__main__26"/><del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11214__Start"/>have<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11214__End"/><del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11218__Start"/>ch<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11218__End"/>
in regarding
me have,
changed <lb n="c57-0064__main__27"/>that air of divine benignity to one
of
<lb n="c57-0064__main__28"/>horror
&
detestation.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0064__main__29"/>Can
you wonder that such <lb n="c57-0064__main__30"/>thoughts transported me with rage? <lb n="c57-0064__main__31"/>I only wonder that at that
moment
<lb n="c57-0064__main__32"/>instead of venting my sensations in
<lb n="c57-0064__main__33"/>useless
exclamations &
agony
I did not <lb n="c57-0064__main__34"/>rush among
mankind
and perish <lb n="c57-0064__main__35"/>in the attempt to destroy
them.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0065__main__1"/>While
I
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>was
overcome by these
feelings
I <lb n="c57-0065__main__2"/>left the spot where I had committed the
<lb n="c57-0065__main__3"/>murder
and
sought
a more secluded
<lb n="c57-0065__main__4"/>hiding place. At that moment I peceiv<lb n="c57-0065__main__5"/>ing
a woman
passing near
me,–
she <lb n="c57-0065__main__6"/>was
young;
not indeed so beautiful as <lb n="c57-0065__main__7"/>her
who
portrait I
held
but of an
<lb n="c57-0065__main__8"/>agreable <del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11290__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11290__End"/> aspect
& blooming in the <lb n="c57-0065__main__9"/>loveliness of
health
&
youth. And here
<lb n="c57-0065__main__10"/>I
thought
is
one
<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11297__Start"/>one<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11297__End"/> of those whose
<lb n="c57-0065__main__11"/>smiles are bestowed on all
but
me
<lb n="c57-0065__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11304__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11304__End"/>
She shall
not
escape my vengeance
<lb n="c57-0065__main__13"/>thanks to the lessons of
Felix
& the <lb n="c57-0065__main__14"/>sanguinary laws of man, I
<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11317__Start"/>know<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11317__End"/>have
learned
how
<lb n="c57-0065__main__15"/>to work mischief. I
approached her
<lb n="c57-0065__main__16"/>unpeceived,
and placed the portrait <lb n="c57-0065__main__17"/>securely in one of the folds of her
<lb n="c57-0065__main__18"/>dress.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0065__main__19"/>For
some
day
I haunted the spot <lb n="c57-0065__main__20"/>where these scenes had taken
place
<lb n="c57-0065__main__21"/>sometimes wishing to see
you
some<lb n="c57-0065__main__22"/>times resolved to quit the world &
it
<lb n="c57-0065__main__23"/>miseries for ever.
<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11352__Start"/>I have<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11352__End"/>At
length I wandered <lb n="c57-0065__main__24"/><lb n="c57-0065__left_margin__1"/>towards these
mountains
and have ranged <lb n="c57-0065__main__25"/><lb n="c57-0065__left_margin__1"/>through their immense
recesses
consumed <lb n="c57-0065__main__26"/>by a burning passion which you <lb n="c57-0065__main__27"/>alone can
gratify—And
we may not <lb n="c57-0065__main__28"/>part
untill
you have promised <lb n="c57-0065__main__29"/>to comply with my
requisitions.
I am
<lb n="c57-0065__main__30"/>alone
&
miserable.
Man will not <lb n="c57-0065__main__31"/>associate with
but one as deformed <lb n="c57-0065__main__32"/>and horrible as
my self
would not <lb n="c57-0065__main__33"/>deny herself to me.
This being you <lb n="c57-0065__main__34"/>must
create.<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11412__Start"/>for me.<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11412__End"/>
